charms.name: Wayward Compass
charms.description: Whispers its location to the bearer whenever a map is open, allowing wanderers to pinpoint their current location.
charms.origin: Bought from Iselda in Dirtmouth for 220 Geo.

effects.effect: Shows the Knight's position on the map.
effects.notes: Purely a navigational tool with no combat effects.

charms.name: Gathering Swarm
charms.description: A swarm will follow the bearer and gather up any loose Geo. Useful for those who can't bother to search for it themselves.
charms.origin: Bought from Sly in Dirtmouth for 300 Geo.

effects.effect: Automatically collects dropped Geo.
effects.notes: The swarm has a slight delay but is very effective at collecting Geo from hard-to-reach places or during combat.

charms.name: Stalwart Shell
charms.description: Builds resilience. When recovering from damage, the bearer will remain invulnerable for longer.
charms.origin: Bought from Sly in Dirtmouth for 200 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases invincibility frames after being hit.
effects.notes: Increases invincibility time from 1.3 seconds to 2 seconds. Also shortens recoil duration.

charms.name: Soul Catcher
charms.description: Used by shamans to draw more SOUL from the world around them. Increases the amount of SOUL gained when striking an enemy with the nail.
charms.origin: Found in the Ancestral Mound after defeating the Elder Baldur.

effects.effect: Gain additional SOUL per nail hit.
effects.notes: Adds +3 SOUL to the main hit (11), for a total of 14 SOUL per hit.

charms.name: Shaman Stone
charms.description: Said to contain the knowledge of past generations of shaman. Increases the power of spells, dealing more damage to foes.
charms.origin: Bought from Salubra in the Forgotten Crossroads for 220 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases damage of all spells.
effects.notes: Increases Vengeful Spirit/Shade Soul damage by ~33%, Desolate Dive by 48%, Descending Dark by 51%, and Howling Wraiths/Abyss Shriek by 50%. Also increases spell size/hitbox.

charms.name: Soul Eater
charms.description: Forbidden charm that contains a living organism that devours SOUL. Greatly increases the amount of SOUL gained when striking an enemy with the nail.
charms.origin: Found in the Resting Grounds, requires Desolate Dive/Descending Dark.

effects.effect: Gain a large amount of additional SOUL per nail hit.
effects.notes: Adds +8 SOUL to the main hit (11), for a total of 19 SOUL per hit.

charms.name: Dashmaster
charms.description: Bears the likeness of an agile bug. The bearer will be able to dash more often as well as dash downwards.
charms.origin: Found in the Fungal Wastes below a statue, near the entrance to the Mantis Village.

effects.effect: Reduces the cooldown between dashes.
effects.notes: Reduces dash cooldown by 33% (from 0.6s to 0.4s). Allows dashing downwards by holding the down button.

charms.name: Sprintmaster
charms.description: Bears the likeness of a strange bug known only as 'the Sprintmaster'. Increases the running speed of the bearer.
charms.origin: Bought from Sly in Dirtmouth after finding the Shopkeeper's Key.

effects.effect: Increases run speed.
effects.notes: Increases base running speed by 20%.

charms.name: Grubsong
charms.description: Contains the gratitude of grubs who will chirp to their saviour. Gain SOUL when taking damage.
charms.origin: Given by the Grubfather in the Forgotten Crossroads after rescuing 10 Grubs.

effects.effect: Gives SOUL when the wearer takes damage.
effects.notes: Gain 15 SOUL each time damage is taken.

charms.name: Grubberfly's Elegy
charms.description: Contains the gratitude of grubs who will chirp to their saviour. When the bearer is at full health, they will fire beams of white-hot energy from their nail.
charms.origin: Given by the Grubfather after rescuing all 46 Grubs.

effects.effect: Fires a projectile when at full health.
effects.notes: The projectile deals 50% of the current Nail's damage.

charms.name: Fragile Heart
charms.description: Increases the health of the bearer. This charm is fragile, and will break if the bearer is killed.
charms.origin: Bought from Leg Eater in the Fungal Wastes for 350 Geo.

effects.effect: Adds bonus health masks.
effects.notes: Adds two masks of health. Breaks on death.

charms.name: Unbreakable Heart
charms.description: Increases the health of the bearer. This charm is unbreakable.
charms.origin: Upgraded from Fragile Heart by Divine for 12,000 Geo.

effects.effect: Adds bonus health masks.
effects.notes: Adds two masks of health.

charms.name: Fragile Greed
charms.description: Causes the bearer to find more Geo when defeating enemies. This charm is fragile, and will break if the bearer is killed.
charms.origin: Bought from Leg Eater in the Fungal Wastes for 250 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases Geo dropped by enemies.
effects.notes: Increases Geo dropped by 20-60%. Breaks on death.

charms.name: Unbreakable Greed
charms.description: Causes the bearer to find more Geo when defeating enemies. This charm is unbreakable.
charms.origin: Upgraded from Fragile Greed by Divine for 9,000 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases Geo dropped by enemies.
effects.notes: Increases Geo dropped by 20-60%.

charms.name: Fragile Strength
charms.description: Strengthens the bearer, increasing the damage they deal to enemies with their nail. This charm is fragile, and will break if the bearer is killed.
charms.origin: Bought from Leg Eater in the Fungal Wastes for 600 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases Nail damage.
effects.notes: Increases Nail damage by 50%. Breaks on death.

charms.name: Unbreakable Strength
charms.description: Strengthens the bearer, increasing the damage they deal to enemies with their nail. This charm is unbreakable.
charms.origin: Upgraded from Fragile Strength by Divine for 15,000 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases Nail damage.
effects.notes: Increases Nail damage by 50%.

charms.name: Spell Twister
charms.description: Reflecting the desires of the Soul Sanctum for mastery over SOUL, this charm fascinates spells, reducing their SOUL cost.
charms.origin: Found in a hidden room at the top of the Soul Sanctum.

effects.effect: Reduces the SOUL cost of spells.
effects.notes: Reduces spell cost from 33 SOUL to 24 SOUL. Allows casting 4 spells from a full SOUL meter instead of 3.

charms.name: Steady Body
charms.description: Keeps its bearer from recoiling backwards when they strike an enemy with a nail. Allows for relentless attacking.
charms.origin: Bought from Salubra for 120 Geo.

effects.effect: Removes all knockback from nail hits.
effects.notes: The Knight no longer gets pushed back when hitting an enemy or object with the Nail.

charms.name: Heavy Blow
charms.description: Formed from the nails of fallen warriors. Increases the force of the bearer's nail, causing enemies to recoil further when hit.
charms.origin: Bought from Sly for 350 Geo after giving him the Shopkeeper's Key.

effects.effect: Greatly increases knockback dealt to enemies.
effects.notes: Increases enemy knockback by 75%. Also makes it easier to stagger bosses.

charms.name: Quick Slash
charms.description: Born from the mind of a great nailmaster, this charm allows the bearer to slash much more rapidly with their nail.
charms.origin: Found in a hidden area in Kingdom's Edge, near the Nailmaster's hut.

effects.effect: Increases the speed of nail swings.
effects.notes: Increases attack rate by 40% (reduces attack duration from 0.35s to 0.25s), significantly increasing DPS.

charms.name: Longnail
charms.description: Increases the range of the bearer's nail, allowing them to strike foes from further away.
charms.origin: Bought from Salubra for 300 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases the reach of the Nail.
effects.notes: Increases nail attack range by 15%.

charms.name: Mark of Pride
charms.description: Freely given by the Mantis Lords to those they respect. Greatly increases the range of the bearer's nail.
charms.origin: Found in a chest in the Mantis Village after defeating the Mantis Lords.

effects.effect: Greatly increases the reach of the Nail.
effects.notes: Increases nail attack range by 25%.

charms.name: Fury of the Fallen
charms.description: Embodies the fury and heroism that comes upon those who face death. When close to death, the bearer's strength will increase.
charms.origin: Hidden behind a breakable wall in the starting area of King's Pass.

effects.effect: Increases Nail damage when at 1 HP.
effects.notes: Increases Nail damage by 75% when the Knight has only one mask of health remaining.

charms.name: Thorns of Agony
charms.description: Senses the pain of its bearer and lashes out at the world around them. When taking damage, sprout thorny vines that damage nearby foes.
charms.origin: Found in a maze of thorns in Greenpath.

effects.effect: Damages nearby enemies upon taking damage.
effects.notes: Deals damage equal to 1x the Nail's current damage in an area around the Knight. The Knight is locked in an animation during this.

charms.name: Baldur Shell
charms.description: Protects its bearer with a hard shell while focusing SOUL. The shell is not indestructible and will shatter if it absorbs too much damage.
charms.origin: Found in a chest in the Howling Cliffs, southwest of the Stag Station.

effects.effect: Provides a shield that blocks hits while healing.
effects.notes: The shell can block up to 4 hits before breaking. The charm must be re-equipped to repair the shell.

charms.name: Flukenest
charms.description: Living charm born in the gut of a Flukemarm. Transforms the Vengeful Spirit spell into a horde of volatile baby flukes.
charms.origin: Dropped by the Flukemarm in the Royal Waterways.

effects.effect: Changes Vengeful Spirit/Shade Soul into a shotgun-like blast of flukes.
effects.notes: Damage potential is high at close range.

charms.name: Defender's Crest
charms.description: Unique charm bestowed by the King of Hallownest to his most loyal knight. Scatters a heroic odour that repels and damages foes.
charms.origin: Dropped by Dung Defender after defeating him.

effects.effect: Creates a damaging toxic cloud around the Knight.
effects.notes: The cloud deals damage every 0.25 seconds. Has unique interactions with other charms.

charms.name: Glowing Womb
charms.description: Drains the SOUL of its bearer and uses it to birth hatchlings. The hatchlings have no desire to live and will kamikaze into enemies.
charms.origin: Found behind a breakable wall in the Forgotten Crossroads, near the False Knight arena.

effects.effect: Spawns friendly hatchlings that attack enemies.
effects.notes: Each hatchling deals 9 damage upon impact. Prevents the player from gathering SOUL normally.

charms.name: Quick Focus
charms.description: A charm containing a crystal lens. It allows the bearer to FOCUS SOUL much faster than usual, allowing them to heal more quickly.
charms.origin: Bought from Salubra for 800 Geo.

effects.effect: Increases the speed of healing.
effects.notes: Reduces the time it takes to Focus (heal) by ~33%.

charms.name: Deep Focus
charms.description: Naturally formed within a crystal over a long period. Draws in SOUL from a further distance and heals two masks at once, but the bearer will move slower while focusing.
charms.origin: Found in Crystal Peak, behind a breakable wall in a difficult platforming area.

effects.effect: Heals two masks per Focus instead of one.
effects.notes: Also slows down the Focus speed by 65%. Effect can be countered by Quick Focus.

charms.name: Lifeblood Heart
charms.description: Contains a living core that seeps Lifeblood. When resting, the bearer will gain a coating of lifeblood that protects from a modest amount of damage.
charms.origin: Bought from Salubra for 250 Geo.

effects.effect: Grants 2 Lifeblood masks when resting at a bench.
effects.notes: These masks do not regenerate and cannot be healed.

charms.name: Lifeblood Core
charms.description: Contains a living core that bleeds Lifeblood. When resting, the bearer will gain a coating of lifeblood that protects from a large amount of damage.
charms.origin: Found behind a gate in the Abyss that requires 15 Lifeblood masks to open.

effects.effect: Grants 4 Lifeblood masks when resting at a bench.
effects.notes: These masks do not regenerate and cannot be healed.

charms.name: Joni's Blessing
charms.description: Blessed by Joni, the kindly heretic. Transfigures the wearer's masks into Lifeblood masks and increases their number.
charms.origin: Found in Joni's Repose in the Howling Cliffs.

effects.effect: Converts all health masks to Lifeblood and increases health.
effects.notes: Increases total available health by 40% and converts all of it to Lifeblood, preventing healing.

charms.name: Hiveblood
charms.description: Golden trinket containing a viscous substance. Heals the bearer's last wound over time, without the use of SOUL.
charms.origin: Acquired from the Hive Queen after fighting through The Hive.

effects.effect: Slowly regenerates the last mask of health lost.
effects.notes: Takes 10 seconds to regenerate one mask. Any new damage taken resets the timer.

charms.name: Spore Shroom
charms.description: Composed of living fungal matter. When focusing SOUL, the bearer will emit a cloud of toxic spores that damages enemies.
charms.origin: Found in the Fungal Wastes, in a room that requires Dash.

effects.effect: Releases a damaging spore cloud while healing.
effects.notes: The cloud deals damage over time to enemies within it.

charms.name: Sharp Shadow
charms.description: Contains a forbidden spell that transforms the bearer into a sharp, shadowy form. The bearer's shadow dash will damage enemies.
charms.origin: Found in Deepnest, behind a Shade Gate.

effects.effect: Shadow Dash deals damage to enemies.
effects.notes: Damage is equal to 1x the Nail's current damage. Also increases Shadow Dash length by 39%.

charms.name: Shape of Unn
charms.description: Reveals the form of Unn within the bearer. While focusing SOUL, the bearer will take on a new shape and can move around freely.
charms.origin: Found in the Lake of Unn after acquiring Isma's Tear.

effects.effect: Allows movement while healing.
effects.notes: Transforms the Knight into a slug-like form that can crawl along the ground while focusing.

charms.name: Nailmaster's Glory
charms.description: Contains the passion, skill and regret of a Nailmaster. Increases the bearer's mastery of Nail Arts, allowing them to be focused and unleashed much faster.
charms.origin: Given by Sly after learning all three Nail Arts.

effects.effect: Reduces the charge time for Nail Arts.
effects.notes: Increases charge speed by 150% (reduces charge time from 1s to 0.4s).

charms.name: Weaversong
charms.description: Silken charm containing a song of farewell, created by the Weavers of Deepnest. Spawns tiny weaverlings that attack enemies.
charms.origin: Found in a hidden room in the Weaver's Den in Deepnest.

effects.effect: Spawns 3 friendly weaverlings.
effects.notes: Each weaverling deals 3 damage per hit. They can also gather SOUL for the Knight if Grubsong is equipped.

charms.name: Dream Wielder
charms.description: Transient charm created for those who wield the Dream Nail. Allows the bearer to charge the Dream Nail faster and collect more SOUL from foes.
charms.origin: Given by the Seer after collecting 500 Essence.

effects.effect: Increases Dream Nail charge speed.
effects.notes: Reduces charge time from 2.4s to 1.2s.

effects.effect: Doubles SOUL gained from using the Dream Nail on enemies.
effects.notes: Yields 66 SOUL instead of the standard 33.

charms.name: Dreamshield
charms.description: A shield that follows the bearer and attempts to block attacks. Can be energised by the Dream Nail to slowly expand and spin faster.
charms.origin: Found in the Resting Grounds in a room below the Seer.

effects.effect: A rotating shield blocks projectiles and deals contact damage.
effects.notes: Shield deals contact damage equal to 1x Nail damage. Breaks and regenerates after blocking a hit.

charms.name: Carefree Melody
charms.description: Token of affection from a certain someone. Contains a song that sometimes protects the bearer from damage.
charms.origin: Given by Divine after banishing the Grimm Troupe. Replaces Grimmchild.

effects.effect: Has a chance to negate any instance of damage.
effects.notes: The chance to block damage increases with each hit taken and resets after a successful block.

charms.name: Grimmchild
charms.description: A charm born of the Grimm Troupe's flame. The bearer must seek out the Grimmkin and collect their flames. Uncollected flames will appear on the map.
charms.origin: Given by Troupe Master Grimm. Upgrades by collecting flames.

effects.effect: Summons a flying minion that attacks enemies.
effects.notes: Damage increases as the charm is upgraded. Attacks every 1.2-1.4 seconds.

charms.name: Kingsoul
charms.description: Holy charm symbolising a union between higher beings. The bearer will slowly absorb the limitless SOUL contained within, generating SOUL over time.
charms.origin: Combine two White Fragment halves, one from the Queen's Gardens and one from the White Palace.

effects.effect: Passively generates SOUL.
effects.notes: Generates 4 SOUL every 2 seconds. Is a key item that transforms into Void Heart.

charms.name: Void Heart
charms.description: An emptiness that was hidden within, now unconstrained. Unifies the void under the bearer's will. This charm is a part of its bearer and cannot be unequipped.
charms.origin: Acquired by transforming the Kingsoul in The Abyss.

effects.effect: Unlocks new endings and makes sibling Shades non-hostile.
effects.notes: The Siblings and the Knight's own Shade will no longer be aggressive. Required for the 'true' endings.

nailUpgrades.name: Sharpened Nail
nailUpgrades.origin: Upgrade from the Nailsmith in the City of Tears.

upgrade.name: Shade Soul
upgrade.origin: Acquired in the Soul Sanctum after defeating Soul Master and using the Elegant Key.
upgrade.notes: Larger, faster, and more powerful version of Vengeful Spirit.

spells.name: Desolate Dive
spells.origin: Acquired from the Soul Master upon defeat.

base.name: Desolate Dive
base.notes: A downward ground-slam spell that provides invincibility frames on activation.

upgrade.name: Descending Dark
upgrade.origin: Found in the Crystallised Mound in Crystal Peak.
upgrade.notes: Larger shockwave and more invincibility frames than Desolate Dive.

spells.name: Howling Wraiths
spells.origin: Found in the Overgrown Mound in the Fog Canyon.

base.name: Howling Wraiths
base.notes: An upward area-of-effect spell that hits multiple times.

upgrade.name: Abyss Shriek
upgrade.origin: Found at the bottom of The Abyss.
upgrade.notes: Larger area-of-effect and an extra hit compared to Howling Wraiths. The highest single-instance damage in the game.
